title: Multi AI Agent 框架全面比較：選擇最適合你的多智能體系統
titleEn: Comprehensive Comparison of Multi AI Agent Frameworks: Choosing the Right Multi-Agent System
summary: 深入比較七種主流的多智能體框架（AutoGen、LangGraph、CrewAI、AgentMesh、AutoAgent、InfiAgent、MAS²），從架構模式、協作方式、開發方式等多個維度進行分析，幫助開發者根據實際需求選擇最適合的框架。
summaryEn: An in-depth comparison of seven mainstream multi-agent frameworks (AutoGen, LangGraph, CrewAI, AgentMesh, AutoAgent, InfiAgent, MAS²), analyzing from multiple dimensions including architecture patterns, collaboration methods, and development approaches to help developers choose the most suitable framework based on actual needs.
description: 完整比較 AutoGen、LangGraph、CrewAI、AgentMesh、AutoAgent、InfiAgent、MAS² 等七種主流多智能體框架，包含技術架構、適用場景、優缺點分析與選擇建議。適合 AI 開發者、系統架構師與技術決策者參考，所有資訊均附有官方文檔與學術論文來源。
descriptionEn: Complete comparison of seven mainstream multi-agent frameworks including AutoGen, LangGraph, CrewAI, AgentMesh, AutoAgent, InfiAgent, and MAS². Covers technical architecture, use cases, pros and cons, and selection recommendations. Ideal for AI developers, system architects, and technical decision-makers. All information backed by official documentation and academic papers.
